data.name: BreakMultipleStatementsPerLineLong
data.value: If checked, statements separated by semicolons are moved onto individual lines. If unchecked, lines with multiple statements are not modified.

data.name: BreakMultipleStatementsPerLineShort
data.value: Place statements on separate lines

data.name: RemoveTrailingSemicolonsLong
data.value: If checked, semicolons at the end of lines will be removed. If unchecked, unnecessary semicolons are not modified.

data.name: RemoveTrailingSemicolonsShort
data.value: Remove unnecessary semicolons

data.name: ReplaceMultipleImportsWithMultipleStatementsLong
data.value: If checked, import statements with multiple modules are separated onto individual lines. If unchecked, import statements with multiple modules are not modified.

data.name: ReplaceMultipleImportsWithMultipleStatementsShort
data.value: Place imported modules on new line

data.name: SpaceAroundAnnotationArrowLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added before and after '->' operators in function definitions. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpaceAroundAnnotationArrowShort
data.value: Insert space before and after return annotation operators

data.name: SpaceAroundDefaultValueEqualsLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added before and after '=' operators in function definitions. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpaceAroundDefaultValueEqualsShort
data.value: Insert spaces around '=' in default parameter values

data.name: SpaceBeforeCallParenLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added between the name and opening parenthesis of the argument list. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpaceBeforeCallParenShort
data.value: Insert space between the function name and argument list in calls

data.name: SpaceBeforeClassDeclarationParenLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added between the name and opening parenthesis of the bases list. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpaceBeforeClassDeclarationParenShort
data.value: Insert space between a class name and bases list

data.name: SpaceBeforeFunctionDeclarationParenLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added between the name and opening parenthesis of the parameter list. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpaceBeforeFunctionDeclarationParenShort
data.value: Insert space between a function name and parameter list in declarations

data.name: SpaceBeforeIndexBracketLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added before an open square bracket. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpaceBeforeIndexBracketShort
data.value: Insert space before open square bracket

data.name: SpacesAroundAssignmentOperatorLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added before and after '=' operators in assignments. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpacesAroundAssignmentOperatorShort
data.value: Insert spaces around assignments

data.name: SpacesAroundBinaryOperatorsLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added before and after binary operators. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpacesAroundBinaryOperatorsShort
data.value: Insert spaces around binary operators

data.name: SpacesWithinEmptyListExpressionLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added between the open square bracket and the close square bracket. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpacesWithinEmptyListExpressionShort
data.value: Insert space within empty square brackets

data.name: SpacesWithinListExpressionLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added after the open square bracket and before the close square bracket of the list. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpacesWithinListExpressionShort
data.value: Insert spaces within square brackets of lists

data.name: SpacesWithinParenthesisedTupleExpressionLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added after the open parenthesis and before the close parenthesis of the tuple. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpacesWithinParenthesisedTupleExpressionShort
data.value: Insert space within tuple parentheses

data.name: SpacesWithinParenthesisExpressionLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added after the open parenthesis and before the close parenthesis of an expression. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpacesWithinParenthesisExpressionShort
data.value: Insert space within parentheses of expression

data.name: SpaceWithinCallParensLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added after the open parenthesis and before the close parenthesis of an argument list. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpaceWithinCallParensShort
data.value: Insert space within argument list parentheses

data.name: SpaceWithinClassDeclarationParensLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added after the open parenthesis and before the close parenthesis of a bases list. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpaceWithinClassDeclarationParensShort
data.value: Insert space within bases list parentheses

data.name: SpaceWithinEmptyBaseClassListLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added after the open parenthesis and before the close parenthesis of an empty bases list. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpaceWithinEmptyBaseClassListShort
data.value: Insert space within empty bases list parentheses

data.name: SpaceWithinEmptyCallArgumentListLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added after the open parenthesis and before the close parenthesis of an empty argument list. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpaceWithinEmptyCallArgumentListShort
data.value: Insert space within empty argument list parentheses

data.name: SpaceWithinEmptyParameterListLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added after the open parenthesis and before the close parenthesis of an empty parameter list. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpaceWithinEmptyParameterListShort
data.value: Insert space within empty parameter list parentheses

data.name: SpaceWithinEmptyTupleExpressionLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added after the open parenthesis and before the close parenthesis of an empty tuple. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpaceWithinEmptyTupleExpressionShort
data.value: Insert space within empty tuple parentheses

data.name: SpaceWithinFunctionDeclarationParensLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added after the open parenthesis and before the close parenthesis of a parameter list. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpaceWithinFunctionDeclarationParensShort
data.value: Insert space within parameter list parentheses

data.name: SpaceWithinIndexBracketsLong
data.value: If checked, a space is added after the open square bracket and before the close square bracket. If unchecked, spaces are removed. Otherwise, spaces are not modified.

data.name: SpaceWithinIndexBracketsShort
data.value: Insert space within square brackets

data.name: WrapCommentsLong
data.value: If checked, comments are wrapped to the specified width. If unchecked, comments are not modified.

data.name: WrapCommentsShort
data.value: Wrap comments that are too wide

data.name: WrappingWidthLong
data.value: The number of the last column that should include comment text. Words after this column are moved to the following line.

data.name: WrappingWidthShort
data.value: Maximum comment width

data.name: LinesBetweenLevelDeclarationsLong
data.value: The number of empty lines to include between class or function declarations at the top level of a module.

data.name: LinesBetweenLevelDeclarationsShort
data.value: Lines between top-level declarations

data.name: LinesBetweenMethodsInClassLong
data.value: The number of empty lines to insert between method or class declarations within a class.

data.name: LinesBetweenMethodsInClassShort
data.value: Lines between class member declarations

data.name: RemoveExtraLinesBetweenMethodsLong
data.value: If checked, removes blank lines between methods and inserts the number specified below. Otherwise, lines between methods are not modified.

data.name: RemoveExtraLinesBetweenMethodsShort
data.value: Remove blank lines between methods

data.name: WrapCommentsLong_Example
data.value: # Not wrapped: # There should be one-- and preferably only one --obvious way to do it.
data.comment: Line breaks and # symbols must be preserved. No new line breaks should be added.

data.name: WrapCommentsShort_Example
data.value: # Wrapped to 40 columns: # There should be one-- and preferably # only one --obvious way to do it.
data.comment: Line breaks and # symbols must be preserved. There must be no more than 40 characters on each line of the localized text (except for the first line)

data.name: WrappingWidth_Doc
data.value: # Sets the width for wrapping comments # and documentation strings.
